subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Outplayed and outthought by a nimble and assured Spanish team, Ukraine was reduced to 10 men by a red card early in the second half and and fell 4-0 in the tournament's most lopsided loss yet.
snippet: Outplayed and outthought by a nimble and assured Spanish team, Ukraine was reduced to 10 men by a red card early in the second half and and fell 4-0 in the tournament's most lopsided loss yet.
